<TextBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="2" Name="tb_medianne" Width="30" ToolTip="medianne" Margin="5" /> <TextBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="3" Name="tb_quasi" ToolTip="quasi" Margin="5" Padding="2" />

</Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="1" Name="gmain"> <Label Content="main:" Margin="0,0,12,0"></Label></Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="2" Name="gmin"> <Label Content="min:" Margin="0,0,12,0"></Label> </Grid> </Grid> </UserControl>
